name: Yaacov Yesha
content: Yaacov Yesha – Department of Computer Science and Electrical Engineering – UMBC Skip to main content Department of Computer Science and Electrical Engineering Menu Apply Search Search Context This Site All of UMBC Location CSEE Main Office: ITE 325 1000 Hilltop Circle Baltimore, MD 21250 Contact Phone: 410-455-3500Contact Us Department of Computer Science and Electrical Engineering on FacebookDepartment of Computer Science and Electrical Engineering on TwitterDepartment of Computer Science and Electrical Engineering on YouTubeDepartment of Computer Science and Electrical Engineering on LinkedIn Position Professor of Computer Science and Electrical Engineering Office 333 Information Technology and Engineering (ITE) Building Contact Information University of Maryland, Baltimore County 1000 Hilltop Circle Baltimore, MD 21250 phone: (410) 455-2669 email: yayesha@cs.umbc.edu website: www.csee.umbc.edu/~yayesha Education Ph.D., Computer Science, Weizmann Institute of Science, 1979 M.Sc., Computer Science, Weizmann Institute of Science, 1974 B.Sc., Chemistry, Tel-Aviv University, 1973 Research Areas Dr. Yesha’s research topics include parallel computing, wireless communication, distributed systems, computational complexity, algorithms, source coding, speech and image compression.
